description: Rich broker response with lots of contextual details - tests ideal notes generation

messages.content: Hi Jeff, I'm reaching out about 699 Industrial Park Dr in Evans. Could you share the property specs including SF, asking rent, NNN, loading doors, clear height, and power?

Jill,

Great timing! 699 Industrial Park is a fantastic space. Here are the details:

- 18,500 SF flex/warehouse
- Asking $6.75/SF/yr triple net
- NNN estimate: $2.10/SF/yr
- 2 grade-level doors (10x12)
- 3 dock-high doors with levelers
- 24' clear height throughout
- 400A 3-phase power, recently upgraded

A few things that make this one special:
- Building was fully renovated in 2021 with new roof, LED lighting, and HVAC
- Fully fenced and secured yard with room for 8-10 trailers
- Owner is motivated and flexible on lease term (will do 3-7 years)
- Located right off I-20 Exit 194, 5 minutes from the port
- ESFR sprinkler system throughout
- Current tenant vacating Feb 1st - available immediately after
- Zoned M-2 heavy industrial, outdoor storage permitted

The landlord mentioned he'd consider a small TI allowance for the right tenant. Happy to set up a tour whenever works for your client.

Let me know!

Jeff Wilson
Wilson Commercial
706-555-1234

ideal_notes: NNN • renovated 2021 • fenced yard • 8-10 trailer spots • owner motivated • flexible 3-7 yr term • near I-20 Exit 194 • ESFR sprinklers • available Feb 1st • M-2 zoning • TI allowance possible
